alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 5:22AM AKST until January 29 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow occuring. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow is expected near Trims Camp. Snow is expected to taper off this morning. Gusty south winds developing this afternoon will cause blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
